acupoint.standard_location: 在肩上，前直乳中，当大椎与肩峰端连线的中点上
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the shoulder, directly above the nipple, at the midpoint of the line connecting Dazhui (GV14) and the acromion
acupoint.simple_method: 肩膀最高点，大椎穴与肩峰连线的中点，按压有酸胀感
acupoint.simple_method_en: At the highest point of the shoulder, midway between the neck and the shoulder tip. Press and feel soreness.
acupoint.anatomical: 在斜方肌上缘中部；有颈横动静脉分支；布有锁骨上神经后支，副神经
functions: 消肿散结 (reduce swelling, dissipate masses)
